title: Weak Vigenère Cipher Challenge
description: Participants will decrypt a message encrypted with a Vigenère cipher using a weak key to discover the hidden flag.
hints: The key is very short; consider trying possible key lengths.
The Vigenère cipher is a repeating pattern cipher; frequency analysis might help.
The key is 'KEY'. Use it to decrypt the message.
learningObjectives: Learn the importance of strong keys in cryptography
Gain skills in basic cryptanalysis techniques
